about.summary: A simple HTTP client, with tools for making HTTP requests, and mocking HTTP requests. The package is built on R6, and takes inspiration from Ruby's 'faraday' gem (<https://rubygems.org/gems/faraday>). The package name is a play on curl, the widely used command line tool for HTTP, and this package is built on top of the R package 'curl', an interface to 'libcurl' (<https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl>).

A simple HTTP client, with tools for making HTTP requests, and mocking HTTP requests. The package is built on R6, and takes inspiration from Ruby's 'faraday' gem (<https://rubygems.org/gems/faraday>). The package name is a play on curl, the widely used command line tool for HTTP, and this package is built on top of the R package 'curl', an interface to 'libcurl' (<https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl>).

name: r-crul
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-crul
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/crul_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/crul/crul_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8e50415e415702402473caf622d86b89ddc881f6e5d888079a4818a8807ac9a2

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6 >=2.2.0
    - r-curl >=3.3
    - r-httpcode >=0.2.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-mime
    - r-urltools >=1.6.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6 >=2.2.0
    - r-curl >=3.3
    - r-httpcode >=0.2.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-mime
    - r-urltools >=1.6.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('crul')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('crul')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/crul (devel) https://ropenscilabs.github.io/http-testing-book/ (user manual)
  license: MIT
  summary: A simple HTTP client, with tools for making HTTP requests, and mocking HTTP requests. The package is built on R6, and takes inspiration from Ruby's 'faraday' gem (<https://rubygems.org/gems/faraday>). The package name is a play on curl, the widely used command line tool for HTTP, and this package is built on top
    of the R package 'curl', an interface to 'libcurl' (<https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl>).
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf

# Package: crul
# Title: HTTP Client
# Description: A simple HTTP client, with tools for making HTTP requests, and mocking HTTP requests. The package is built on R6, and takes inspiration from Ruby's 'faraday' gem (<https://rubygems.org/gems/faraday>). The package name is a play on curl, the widely used command line tool for HTTP, and this package is built on top of the R package 'curl', an interface to 'libcurl' (<https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl>).
